block.p: Anne Robin Nieder, a daughter of Helaine Nieder and Dr. Joseph Nieder of New York, is to be married today to Graham Richard Clegg, the son of Mary and Raymond Clegg of Wolviston, England. Cantor David Benedict is to officiate at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden.

The bride, 26, graduated from the University of California at Berkeley and is to receive a medical degree from the University of Vermont next Sunday. In July, she will begin a residency in psychiatry and family practice at Beth Israel Medical Center in New York. Her father, a psychiatrist, practices in New York.

Anne Robin Nieder, a daughter of Helaine Nieder and Dr. Joseph Nieder of New York, is to be married today to Graham Richard Clegg, the son of Mary and Raymond Clegg of Wolviston, England. Cantor David Benedict is to officiate at the Brooklyn Botanic Garden.

The bride, 26, graduated from the University of California at Berkeley and is to receive a medical degree from the University of Vermont next Sunday. In July, she will begin a residency in psychiatry and family practice at Beth Israel Medical Center in New York. Her father, a psychiatrist, practices in New York.

The bridegroom, 34, practiced divorce law in Liverpool, England, until earlier this year. He received undergraduate and law degrees from Manchester University in England. His father retired as a mechanical engineer at the Davy McKee Corporation, a civil engineering company in Stockton-on-Tees, England. The bridegroom's mother retired as a sales associate in Hartlepool, England, at Marks & Spencer, the department store.
